name: Bomberpet
description: Bomberpet is a multiplayer game with an overhead view and simple controls. In fact, in addition to movement, the player has different abilities due to the power-ups he can collect during the game. Each bomb explodes in four directions, the explosion can destroy enemies or destroy walls. Various bonuses can be found in the walls. The goal of each level is to destroy all enemies. At the end of each game you get rewards.
